reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well, with one noting it's particularly suitable for taller women, and they appreciate its flattering silhouette that hugs curves.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely recommend!!
items.body: AMAZING!! The dress is so fitting and comfortable. True to size and still is stretchy. Lightweight and you can definitely dress it up or down. Not see through, good material not too thick or thin, just right. Definitely recommend. Read more
items.author: Bel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft! Not see through! Confidence boosting!
items.body: For reference iâ€™m 5â€™8â€, 145lbs, 34B, and I got a size Small! This dress is great material like spandex and perfect white color! I know everyone sees white and thinks oh no itâ€™s gonna be see through, this one is not! Yes if you guys wear black undergarments itâ€™s gonna show but I wore nude and it was all white, no skin/nude color coming through. I did wear this for my halloween costume last year with my bf (he was Wall-e, I was Eve) and it was so comfortable, so cute and great value. The fit was amazing and made me feel so comfortable and confident! Iâ€™ve also never worn a square neck line and after wearing this iâ€™ve realized I love that style! I have worn this twice after halloween and still continues to be a hit! Love it!! Read more
items.author: Kylie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: I'm a size small, 5'2", 110lbs, with a 36C chest. This dress is a little to put on at first, but once it is on, it fits like a glove! And it feels really good to wear. Very flattering! It's soft and not sheer. I do recommend wearing a strapless bra or the soft nipple covers, though. The straps on the bra will be very noticeable in the shoulder area of the dress. Also, wear a pair of underwear that won't leave any noticeable lines in the dress. Probably like a thong or a nice shape-wear. It stretches out to just the right amount you need it to without over-stretching. I paired the dress with a pair of my favorite boot heels and tights, and it was absolutely BANGIN'! Wearing it this weekend for date night to surprise my fiancÃ©. The man's jaw is going to drop! Read more
items.author: Bonnie Blue

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress
items.body: Super cute! Material is very thin and does rise up as you walk, it is very fitted. I bought a size large, Iâ€™m 5â€™4 and 170lbs and it came to about mid thigh. So size up if you donâ€™t want a super tight fit. Read more
items.author: Rodarte1061

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite dress now
items.body: Such a great purchase! Not only does it fit like a glove and the perfect size. The fabric is super nice and not see through at all. The fit is flattering and I would buy in other colors. I feel super confident in it. Read more
items.author: Sydney Engler

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it
items.body: Could not say enough about this dress. Absolutely perfect fit and the material is super soft and stretchy. True to size. Got so many compliments on this dress. Need in every color Read more
items.author: Sydney

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the dress
items.body: Very flattering and soft texture Read more
items.author: Sam

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars THIS DRESS IS STUNNING
items.body: SO COMFY, so soft! Major stretch! Iâ€™m usually an xl but sized down to a large and it fit amazing and wasnâ€™t tight. Not see through and got tons of compliments on it!! ðŸ¥° Read more
items.author: Martha

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Winered, White, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
